Literature.Title: Antiplasmodial Activity Is an Ancient and Conserved Feature of Tick Defensins.
Literature.Author: Cabezas-Cruz A, Tonk M, Bouchut A, Pierrot C, Pierce RJ, Kotsyfakis M, Rahnamaeian M, Vilcinskas A, Khalife J, Valdés JJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Listeria monocytogenes DSM 20600(no activity data),Listeria fleischmannii DSM 24998(no activity data),Listeria grayi DSM 20601(no activity data),Listeria marthii DSM 23813(no activity data),Listeria innocua DSM 20649(no activity data),Listeria welshimeri DSM 20650(no activity data),Listeria seeligeri DSM 20751(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus DSM 2569(no activity data),Staphylococcus epidermidis DSM 3269(no activity data),Escherichia coli D31(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa DSM 50071(no activity data),Plasmodium falciparum(40-50% Inhibition=50µM)
